name: home-assistant-time-machine
description: HomeAssistant Time Machine allows Home Assistant users to view historical states and visualize past configurations of their smart home setup via snapshots. Useful for debugging automations or state changes.
features: Historical States: View past states of all Home Assistant entities at any point in time.
Configuration Snapshots: Access previous configurations to understand what changed and when.
Automation Debugging: Troubleshoot automations by reviewing historical triggers and state changes.
Timeline Visualization: Navigate through your smart home's history with an intuitive timeline interface.
State Comparison: Compare entity states across different time periods to identify patterns.
Backup Analysis: Review configuration backups and restore points with detailed state information.
Troubleshooting Tool: Diagnose issues by examining exactly what happened during specific incidents.
Data Retention: Maintain long-term historical data for analysis and debugging purposes.
